programme.desc: Sparks fly between Jenny and Nate at a corporate retreat, despite him being her boss’s brother.

programme.title: Fatal Memories
programme.desc: In this thriller, a woman tries to help her sister recall the events of the fatal stabbing of their mother.

programme.title: Shogun's Ninja
programme.desc: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. He sends his war commander in search of the clan's hidden gold only to find that two daggers are the key to the hiding place of the treasured gold. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.title: The Italian Connection
programme.desc: The mob, bent on murderous revenge, pursues a man they mistakenly believe responsible for the theft of one of their drug shipments. Their elusive prey, however, has plans of his own, and they also include revenge.

programme.title: Grave Of The Vampire
programme.desc: A young man, born of a rape committed by a legendary vampire against a living woman, vows to locate and vanquish his undead father.

programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. They hide the money in an empty coffin and hire a woman to pose as a widow to a dead officer to make it look official. Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Romedy Now
programme.desc: The host sheds light on various popular individuals from different walks of life and highlights their individual journeys to stardom.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent, reprises his disguise as a Southern grandmother and works as a nanny to unveil the culprits responsible for designing a deadly computer virus.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: Just Go With It
programme.desc: A successful plastic surgeon attempts to win over a young match teacher by convincing his secretary to pose as his soon-to-be ex-wife.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When Gargamel learns that Smurfette knows a secret spell that can turn Naughties, Smurf-like creatures, into real Smurfs, he kidnaps her. The Smurfs set out to rescue Smurfette.

programme.title: Fun With Dick and Jane
programme.desc: When Dick's employer goes bankrupt, he and his wife, Jane, go broke and look for ways to make ends meet. Eventually, they resort to crime and decide to rob a crooked CEO to get their money back.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit lives in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden with his three sisters. Their joyful lives are interrupted by the arrival of Thomas, Mr. McGregor's nephew, who wants to drive Peter away.

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: A wrongfully terminated employee convinces her spoiled and wealthy ex-boss that they are married after he falls off his yacht and gets amnesia.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: A Seattle reporter's life is shaken when a street seer predicts her imminent death, pushing her to rethink love, friendship and career choices.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: Firehouse Dog
programme.desc: Rexxx, a top Hollywood canine, gets lost and finds himself in a warehouse. He slowly realises his capabilities as a firehouse dog and befriends a young child to revamp the fire station.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore believe that Dave is going to propose to his girlfriend, Samantha, in Miami. In a bid to retain their place in Dave's life, the three set out to stop him.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
programme.desc: A recent Harvard Law graduate, Elle Woods campaigns for Bruiser's Bill in Washington DC. She overcomes many obstacles to win her fight against animal testing.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: After a night of wild partying, Jack and Joy, two strangers, awake and find they have married each other. Things get complicated when Jack wins a huge jackpot with Joy's quarter, and they must stay together for six months to get money.
